General.Name: Pro Real Estate Investment Trust
General.Description: PROREIT (TSX:PRV.UN) is an unincorporated open-ended real estate investment trust established pursuant to a declaration of trust under the laws of the Province of Ontario. Founded in 2013, PROREIT owns a portfolio of high-quality commercial real estate properties in Canada, with a strong industrial focus in robust secondary markets.
General.Address: 2000 Mansfield Street, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3A 2Z7
